Heyo! I'm Kelly, a product designer currently studying Systems Design engineering at University of Waterloo.

I've most recently worked at Quora, and have previously worked at 500px. I believe it's important to be a holistic designer, and I've been challenging myself on every aspect from product design, technical development, to visual execution.

Thanks for stopping by!
